title: Secondo account
creator: battilanadonato
content:
Buongiorno, Ho appena installato la vostra app e poi ho aggiunto il mio account pricipale. Volevo installare un secondo account ma mi visualizza, nonostante ho controllato, questo messaggio: “Autenticazione non riuscita. Assicurati che nome utente e password siano corretti”

Grazie
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/140.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:Windows 10

title: Text of some emails tiny in Thunderbird for Android, but not in Outlook
creator: Tombarkas
content: Hello. Some emails I get (TP-Link, Google groups) are normal in Thunderbird for PC, but tiny in Thunderbird for Android and normal in Outlook on Android. It's only a few emails - is there a setting in TB for Android I can tweak?
metadata: ;solver_id:1591011;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/140.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/140.0.0.0

title: I get into my emails using the icon on my PC.  Now I am asked (for my new vodaphone) for my email password.  Where do I find it?
creator: redacted@f2s.com
content: I usually reach my emails through the icon on my PC. On my new Vodaphone, I am asked for my email password. Where do I find it?
